definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: lay up, store up (Mish. id., Aram. [[אֲחַר]], 0es.ar, Ar. 0as.ara confine, restrict)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. [[אָֽחְרוּ]] 2Ki 20:17; Is 39:6; Pt. [[הָאׂחְרִים]] Am 3:10; —store up) treasure 2Ki 20:17 = Is 39:6; obj. [[חָמָס וׇשׁׂד]] Am 3:10, i.e. treasure gained by violence robbery.

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Impf. [[יֵאָחֵר]] be stored up, of the merchandise of Tyre Is 23:18.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Impf. [[וׇאוֹחְרָה]] (cf. Kö:i, 391) (denom. from [[אוֹחָר]]) Ne 13:13 and I appointed treasurer, sq. acc. pers. + [[עַל־אוֹחָרוֹת]].
